title: Can't play the game (patch files corrupted?)
body:
Hi, as the title says i can't get to play the game since yesterday, because i think my patch files are corrupted. 
(i run everything as admin, sorry from the rough translation) 
when i access through the launcher, either it says "rads error: couldn't find http server" and the it closes, or when i get to the client it first appears a message telling me that the lol client is updating my links, and the OS may ask for admin permissions; then it tells me "a problem has occurred during the patching, so a backup version will be restored, and we'll try to update after the patcher reboot", so i have to reboot; the client reboots, and a message tells me "an earlier version of LoL ha been restored, we'll try to update the game to the latest version."; rinse and repeat. 

Sometimes it let me get past the login, but after a short time, it appears the message ""a problem has occurred during the patching, so a backup version will be restored, and we'll try to update after the patcher reboot" and so the loop i wrote above begins. 

If i access directly through the client, i can't login because it say i may be offline, tho i'm not. or i login, and it happens the same stuff i wrote earlier. 

So i sent a support ticket, and i did all they told me to do:

i downloaded the hextec support tool, but it did nothing, except now even the support tool crashes when gathering logs, and it says the chromium embedded framework has stopped working; 

i reinstalled both the patch, and the entire game, but the problem still remains; 

i ran the memory diagnostic and fix tool, but nothing, the problem persists. 

I'm desperate, and i don't know what to do...thanks for the attention

replies.body: Hey, these errors that you're getting are very common with security settings that's preventing folders and game files from being accessed.  You should start off by going over each step of our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access, as well as double checking your anti-virus config.  I hope that helps!

ok, i did everything that was in the list, i've also installed "vcredist_x86.exe" and "vcredist_x64.exe" from the Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013, as told by your support team, but nothing. in the end iinstalled a copy of the game from a friend. it went well for a day, but then the problem started to happen again

Hi! thank you for replying!
what about the hextec tool crashes? 
anyways, i tried everything in that list, but to reinstall as administrator, so that's waht i'm going to do now, because i keep getting the same problem. 

about the antivirus, i uninstalled norton antivirus a month or two ago. however sometimes, when i want to get to a webpage, it shows instead that norton connectsafe has blocked a maliciuos website (even if such website is facebook, youtube, or your boards, which are safe websites!). i uninstalled norton, so i shouldn't have such nuisances while navigating the web....may this be connected to my LoL problem somehow? 
Still thanks for the help, i'll let you know if running the setup as admin works =)
